fields.description: Customer Deposit ID. This is the Customer Deposit unique identifier.

Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.
Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Customer Payment inside the Workday Application. Customer Payment can only be updated from the web service is this is set.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

The sequence ID for customer deposits. This is an optional value and you can set it up using the ID Generator for Customer Deposits prompt in the Edit Tenant Setup - Financials task under the Business Document Sequence IDs section or in the Edit Company ID Definitions task on the Company Specific Settings tab.

Locked_in_Workday.description: Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Customer Payment inside the Workday Application. Customer Payment can only be updated from the web service is this is set.
